title: Tests failures on i686-pc-mingw32

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

body:
```
$ rustc --version
rustc.exe 0.10-pre (0e95b08 2014-03-06 15:11:42 -0800)
host: i686-pc-mingw32
```

`make check` Failures:
